Class Adapter_character

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Character>
        • com.minastelien.quentin.gestionnairedesporz.Adapters.Adapter_character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Adapter_character_setup, Adapter_character_sumup, Adapter_character_vote

    public abstract class Adapter_character
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Character>
    Abstract Adapter for characters. Initializes GameSingleton access. Created by Quentin on 28/12/2015.

        protected int seek_object(java.lang.Object target,
                          java.util.ArrayList a)
        Given an object and an ArrayList, finds the position of the object in the ArrayList
        Parameters:

        a - The ArrayList to be looked over.
